item.title: A new all-inclusive brand with resorts in Mexico, the Caribbean and Spain will officially join World of Hyatt in March
item.description: Bahia Principe all-inclusive resorts will join World of Hyatt on March 24, 2026.

item.title: Deal of the day: Fly nonstop to Egypt for as few as 40,000 Aeroplan points
item.description: Points and miles deal of the day: Here's how you can fly to Egypt using travel rewards in 2026.

item.title: Air Canada to connect North America to Japan's top ski destination
item.description: Air Canada will offer the only nonstop to Sapporo in northern Japan and North America next winter.

item.title: Atmos Rewards Business card review: Good for frequent Alaska and Hawaiian business travelers

item.title: American Airlines: Winter Storm Fern now worst weather disruption in history
item.description: American Airlines says Winter Storm Fern has produced the worst string of weather cancellations in the airline's history.
